name: Zig-Zag (dk'tronics)
overview: A 3D maze shooter also released in Digital Marketing PD #021. You find yourself armed with a laser rifle inside of an insidious maze. You have to try to snare the little green monsters and then kill them. The more you move, the more you consume energy. Careful not to completely exhaust it, otherwise the game will be finished. Stopping too long in one place puts you at risk for attack to be on guard. Published in Italy as Obiettivo Alieni in Logica 2000 n.27 (Maggio 1986).
